testimonials.text: Darshan is one of the best among all people I have ever met and is a loyal colleague, understands complex matters. Darshan is a strong and goal oriented team player; with every problem there was a solution. Highly recommended.

That Darshan Patel must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
